0011100111011100 1011110000000010 0 -> sum: 1111010111011110, cout: 0
1100100000011101 0001110010000101 0 -> sum: 1110010010100010, cout: 0
1010110001111010 1010000111000101 0 -> sum: 0100111000111111, cout: 1
0101100001011111 0001101101100001 1 -> sum: 0111001111000001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
